features: Battery free mighty Echo microphone: do you dream of being a famous singer? With the high-quality, battery-free mighty Echo microphone toy, everyone can sing like a pop-star!
Echo-effect: Hope mighty Echo microphone ensures hours of fun for the little musicians. Kids can sing their favorite songs and add Echo to the voice without batteries
Attractive colors: This Microphone toy features attractive primary colors with musical note graphics. Whether you are singing alone or playing with a band, this will help you stand out
Creative Learning and development: The music toy stimulates speech and singing ability in toddlers. This toy promotes development of musical skills and creative expression
Age Recommendation: the Hape mighty Echo microphone is perfect for kids 12 months and up
Safe to play with: non-toxic finishes and child safe materials. All Hape toys are made to a high-quality safety Standard to ensure many years of safe play are enjoyed amongst all
body.description: Let your child's inner pop Star shine with Hape mighty Echo microphone. Foster their musicality and let them sing until their hearts are content, without excessive noise driving you Mad. the mighty microphone will encourage your child to learn certain skills, in particular speech and drama as well as singing skills. hape toys stimulate children through every stage of development and help nurture and develop their natural abilities. All Hape products sold in North America meet or exceed all applicable safety standards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NON-STOP MUSICAL FUN Hours of musical fun for your little pop star. This powerful Echo microphone requires no batteries to add a fun echo effect to your children's voice. SAFE NATURAL MATERIALS Only non-toxic finishes and safe materials for children's safety and parents' peace of mind. All Hape toys are manufactured to high quality standards to ensure years of play. WORKS WITHOUT BATTERIES With this microphone, you don't need batteries to echo your voice. Have fun singing your favorite song and enjoy the special effects!

VIBRANT COLORS AND GRAPHICS You don't want to overwhelm children with excessive stimuli. The bright primary colors and music-related graphics are perfect for engaging little pop stars! NURTURE LITTLE TALENT FROM 12M+ It's never too early to nurture their budding talent. The powerful Hape Echo Microphone is perfect for kids 12 months and up! ROLE PLAY AS A SINGER There's a little pop star in all of us: let it shine with this toy microphone! Children will have fun singing along without excessive noise stressing out parents.
High quality microphone A rainbow colored xylophone Six instruments in one Easy-to-grip rainmaker A pounding toy Age group 12M+ 12M+ 18M+ 0M+ 12M+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Battery-less microphone FTW
reviews.reviewText: LOVE THIS THING. it satisfies kids' desire to be amplified, but it doesn't drive everyone else in the house crazy. no batteries is a win. it's super sturdy since it's basically just springs inside echoing. it's been dropped and tossed around with no problems. the one change i would have made is for the "button" to actually work like a button. also, because it's hape, i know it's quality and non-toxic, so i don't worry about the kids putting their mouths on it to yell into it, etc...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s cute , but I kinda wish it was louder😂 I use it and it’s not much of an echo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality - Big Hit
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for the music & movement classes I teach. It’s been a hit. Because of the nature of the toy, it has “holes” in the top, so I do hope I can continue properly cleaning/disinfecting it since different kids/classes use it. Also, I will say the quality is excellent. It may not have the *boom* of similar mics I had as a kid, but the quality is much better than those.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was an Early Christmas gift for my grandson and he loves hearing his voice like an echo it helps with teaching new words and the sound because he attempts to repeat what you're saying. It's a great toy and educational tool. I recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It echoes because there’s a spring inside that vibrates your voice to make the echo effect. So it works in that way. But it’s not loud. The baby plays with it sometimes but if youre looking for a loud echo this isn’t a good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable not too loud
reviews.reviewText: All the perks of a mic without being overly loud/obnoxious. Love that it requires no battery/charging. My toddler and elementary school-aged kids both enjoy using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So helpful with vocal development.
reviews.reviewText: My toddler had been right on the cusp of gaining vocal confidence. This allowed him to hear himself talk and within the week we had so many more words. Would and have recommended to several other new parents

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So fun for our one year old
reviews.reviewText: Our son loves this toy. He always using anything he could find to make noises into it, so we got him this for Christmas. He will not put it down. It isn't too loud so it doesn't drive us parents crazy haha. Very light weight, easy to travel with or through in his backpack for a toy out running errands. The price is wonderful.
Mes enfants l'utilisent régulièrement ! C'est un jouet solide et qui permet de faire toutes sortes de jeux. C'est exactement ce que je voulais.

reviews.reviewTitle: Misleading if you check pics and title. Not powerful echo, physical button does nothing.
reviews.reviewText: It can be slightly misleading if you check out only the pics and the title.There is a button there that does nothing, also emphasized in the package itself, in a form of a picture. Why would they do that, if it just does nothing.I would have not bought it if I would have a clearer picture of the product features, basically your voices echoes.

reviews.reviewerName: It really met my expectation. My previous chopper was small. This new chopper is very sharp and spacious. It chops onions in very short time than my previous chopper. The blades are very sharp. I hope it will last me longer like my old chopper. Very happy with the purchase
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is a durable non battery operated microphone. I bought it for my soon to be 2 years old who hasn’t spoke his first word. I hope it helps him with his speech. Its a good quality as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product ziet er leuk uit en beloofd veel. Het geld niet waard, het echo effect is nauwelijks hoorbaar. Jammer...

La qualità dei prodotti HAPE e' sempre altissima. Bel microfono per i più piccoli che si possono divertire a sentire la propria voce amplificata. Il microfono fa l'effetto giusto anche ad una certa distanza (3/4 metri), i miei figli si divertono tantissimo ad utilizzarlo senza disturbare tutto il vicinato.
